# Last updated: 2026-02-21

# Tauri v2 Documentation Index

> Use this file with WebFetch to access official Tauri v2 documentation on demand.
> Format: [Title](URL) — short description

## Start
- [Create a Project](https://v2.tauri.app/start/create-project) — scaffolding with create-tauri-app
- [What is Tauri?](https://v2.tauri.app/start) — overview and positioning
- [Prerequisites](https://v2.tauri.app/start/prerequisites) — system requirements per OS
- [Project Structure](https://v2.tauri.app/start/project-structure) — src-tauri layout, lib.rs/main.rs
- [Frontend Configuration](https://v2.tauri.app/start/frontend) — framework integration overview
- [SvelteKit](https://v2.tauri.app/start/frontend/sveltekit) — SvelteKit frontend setup
- [Vite](https://v2.tauri.app/start/frontend/vite) — Vite frontend setup
- [Next.js](https://v2.tauri.app/start/frontend/nextjs) — Next.js frontend setup
- [Nuxt](https://v2.tauri.app/start/frontend/nuxt) — Nuxt frontend setup
- [Upgrade from Tauri 1.0](https://v2.tauri.app/start/migrate/from-tauri-1) — v1 to v2 migration guide

## Core Concepts
- [Tauri Architecture](https://v2.tauri.app/concept/architecture) — core process, webview, crates
- [Process Model](https://v2.tauri.app/concept/process-model) — core vs webview processes
- [Inter-Process Communication](https://v2.tauri.app/concept/inter-process-communication) — IPC overview
- [Brownfield Pattern](https://v2.tauri.app/concept/inter-process-communication/brownfield) — default IPC mode
- [Isolation Pattern](https://v2.tauri.app/concept/inter-process-communication/isolation) — sandboxed IPC

## Security
- [Security Overview](https://v2.tauri.app/security) — security model introduction
- [Capabilities](https://v2.tauri.app/security/capabilities) — capability files and schema
- [Permissions](https://v2.tauri.app/security/permissions) — permission syntax and sets
- [Command Scopes](https://v2.tauri.app/security/scope) — FS and HTTP scoping
- [Content Security Policy](https://v2.tauri.app/security/csp) — CSP configuration
- [HTTP Headers](https://v2.tauri.app/security/http-headers) — COOP/COEP headers
- [Runtime Authority](https://v2.tauri.app/security/runtime-authority) — invoke key, ACL enforcement

## Develop
- [Calling Rust from the Frontend](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/calling-rust) — commands, invoke, args, async, errors
- [Calling the Frontend from Rust](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/calling-frontend) — events, channels, eval
- [Configuration Files](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/configuration-files) — tauri.conf.json schema
- [State Management](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/state-management) — Mutex, State<T>, manage()
- [Embedding Additional Files](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/resources) — bundle.resources
- [Embedding External Binaries](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/sidecar) — sidecars and target triples
- [App Icons](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/icons) — tauri icon generation
- [Plugin Development](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/plugins) — creating custom plugins
- [Mobile Plugin Development](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/plugins/develop-mobile) — Kotlin/Swift plugins
- [Debug](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/debug) — DevTools, VS Code, logging
- [Debug in VS Code](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/debug/vscode) — CodeLLDB configuration
- [Tests](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/tests) — testing strategies
- [Mock Tauri APIs](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/tests/mocking) — @tauri-apps/api/mocks
- [WebDriver Testing](https://v2.tauri.app/develop/tests/webdriver) — tauri-driver E2E

## Distribute
- [Distribute Overview](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute) — bundling and packaging
- [Windows Installer](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/windows-installer) — NSIS and WiX
- [macOS Application Bundle](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/macos-application-bundle) — .app and DMG
- [Debian](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/debian) — .deb packaging
- [AppImage](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/appimage) — universal Linux
- [RPM](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/rpm) — Fedora/RHEL
- [Flathub](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/flatpak) — Flatpak distribution
- [Snapcraft](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/snapcraft) — Snap distribution
- [App Store](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/app-store) — Mac App Store
- [Google Play](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/google-play) — Android distribution
- [Microsoft Store](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/microsoft-store) — Windows Store
- [macOS Code Signing](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/sign/macos) — notarization
- [Windows Code Signing](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/sign/windows) — Authenticode
- [Linux Code Signing](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/sign/linux) — GPG signing
- [Android Code Signing](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/sign/android) — keystore
- [iOS Code Signing](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/sign/ios) — provisioning
- [GitHub Pipelines](https://v2.tauri.app/distribute/pipelines/github) — tauri-action CI/CD

## Learn
- [System Tray](https://v2.tauri.app/learn/system-tray) — tray icon tutorial
- [Window Customization](https://v2.tauri.app/learn/window-customization) — titlebar, effects
- [Window Menu](https://v2.tauri.app/learn/window-menu) — native menus
- [Splashscreen](https://v2.tauri.app/learn/splashscreen) — splash screen pattern
- [Node.js as a Sidecar](https://v2.tauri.app/learn/sidecar-nodejs) — Node.js sidecar
- [Using Plugin Permissions](https://v2.tauri.app/learn/security/using-plugin-permissions) — permissions tutorial
- [Writing Plugin Permissions](https://v2.tauri.app/learn/security/writing-plugin-permissions) — custom permissions

## Plugins (Official)

### File System & Storage
- [File System (fs)](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/file-system/) — scoped file I/O with watch support
- [Store](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/store/) — key-value JSON persistence
- [SQL](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/sql/) — SQLite/MySQL/PostgreSQL via sqlx
- [Stronghold](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/stronghold/) — encrypted vault storage (IOTA)
- [Persisted Scope](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/persisted-scope/) — auto-persist FS scope grants

### Networking
- [HTTP Client](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/http-client/) — scoped HTTP with CORS bypass
- [WebSocket](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/websocket/) — WebSocket client
- [Upload](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/upload/) — file upload/download with progress

### UI & System Interaction
- [Dialog](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/dialog/) — file pickers and message boxes
- [Notification](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/notification/) — system notifications
- [Clipboard](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/clipboard-manager/) — clipboard read/write
- [Global Shortcut](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/global-shortcut/) — system-wide hotkeys (desktop)
- [Opener](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/opener/) — open URLs, files, reveal in explorer
- [Window State](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/window-state/) — persist window position/size (desktop)
- [Positioner](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/positioner/) — predefined window positions (desktop)

### System & OS
- [OS Information](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/os-information/) — platform detection
- [Process](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/process/) — exit and relaunch
- [Shell](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/shell/) — command execution and sidecars (desktop)
- [CLI](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/cli/) — command-line argument parsing (desktop)
- [Autostart](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/autostart/) — launch at login (desktop)
- [Single Instance](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/single-instance/) — prevent multiple instances (desktop)
- [Log](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/log/) — structured multi-target logging

### Lifecycle & Distribution
- [Updater](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/updater/) — self-updating with Ed25519 signature (desktop)
- [Deep Link](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/deep-link/) — custom URL protocol handling
- [Localhost](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/localhost/) — local HTTP server for frontend (desktop)

### Mobile-Specific
- [Barcode Scanner](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/barcode-scanner/) — camera barcode/QR scanning
- [Biometric](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/biometric/) — Face ID, Touch ID, fingerprint
- [NFC](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/nfc/) — NFC tag read/write
- [Geolocation](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/geolocation/) — GPS position tracking
- [Haptics](https://v2.tauri.app/plugin/haptics/) — vibration and haptic feedback
